testcase.name: Verify that the elements of LoginPage are visible
Verify "Go1Percent" logo, carousel images, carousel caption and the footer message (TC-337) - Version1
Verify that tag line with text "Get 1% Better Everyday" is displayed (TC-338) - Version1
Verify that carousel image changes while clicking on carousel button (TC-339) - Version1
Verify that specific text between login options is present on the web page (TC-341) - Version1
Verify that login page heading contains text "Sign in to Go 1%" is displayed (TC-340) - Version1
Verify that clicking on the Microsoft logo redirects to the Microsoft login page (TC-342) - Version1
Verify that login fails with invalid credentials and an alert message is displayed (TC-343) - Version1
Verify remember me checkbox is selected during login (TC-345) - Version1
Verify the forgot Password functionality (TC-346) - Version1
Verify clicking on the "Terms of Use" link opens a new page with the terms of use
Verify clicking on the "privacy Policy" link opens a new page with the terms of use
